mapper.insert: insert into calendar values( seq_calendar_no.nextval, 'testcode', '', #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{allDay}, #{textColor}, #{backgroundColor}, #{backgroundColor}, #{type} )
mapper.update: update calendar set start_date = to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), end_date = to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') where no = #{no}

update calendar set title = #{title}, all_day = #{allDay}, start_date = to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), end_date = to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), type = #{type}, content = #{content}, background_color = #{backgroundColor} where no = #{no}
